title: Second Date Update: Did She Do Something Offensive On Their Date?
description:
Here’s how second date update works: you had a first date, it was great, you think a second one is coming…and then out of nowhere, they drop you. No second date, no nothing. But things were going SO WELL – what happened?!
Fiona met a guy online, and they ended up meeting for a date. She thought the date went well even though she drank more than she expected. The date ended with a kiss, and that's the last she heard from him.
The next day she went to message him, and his account was gone. Now she's wondering what she did wrong for him to ghost her.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
